name: The Secret Room (IloBizon)
description:
Game time: around 5-10 minutes

The Secret Room is a single-player short PSX horror game. This First-person game takes place in at first glance, an ordinary house, but who knows what secrets does it keep.

Story

A couple goes missing in a small town in the USA. The investigation has been ongoing for more than 2 years, but no evidence has been found.

The suspect in the murder is their son. He lives in his parents' house and does not even think that the police want to search his house. He begins to see ghosts, blood on the floor. All this leads him to a sad ending.

This is the first game we've ever published, although it may not be perfect, we hope you will find it enjoyable. If you would like to support our growth as developers, your donation would be greatly appreciated!

(For a better experience, use headphones).
